sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Procter & Gamble ( PG ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.7%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble has lost about 12.7% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is General Electric ( GE ), trading down 0.8%.
General Electric is lower by about 22.3% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are International Business Machines ( IBM ), trading down 0.6%, and Exxon Mobil ( XOM ), trading up 1.4% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
